item.title: Learning Analytics: Multiple Regression Analysis
item.description:
1. Learning Analytics

Learning analytics is computational approach analyzing large-sized students’ learning and education data. It became pretty much popular as the online learning and digitized school administrative platforms produce an infinite flow of students’ data on a daily basis. Many higher education institutions actively seeks for learning analytics to promote data-driven decision-making and evidence-based institutional innovation, targeting to enhance students’ performance, retention, and administrative efficiency.
